field.name: youtube_rel
field.label: youTube Related
field.description: Related videos are displayed when the menu button is pressed

field.name: youtube_loop
field.label: youTube Loop
field.description: Play the initial video or playlist again and again

field.name: youtube_egm
field.label: youTube Enhanced Genie Menu
field.description: This behavior causes the genie menu (if present) to appear when the user's mouse enters the video display area

field.name: youtube_border
field.label: youTube Border
field.description: Enables a border around the entire video player

field.name: youtube_color1
field.label: youTube Color 1: #
field.description: The border's primary color. RGB Hexadecimal (22FF00)

field.name: youtube_color2
field.label: youTube Color 2: #
field.description: Control bar background color and secondary border color. RGB Hexadecimal (22FF00)

field.name: jw_logo
field.label: JW Watermark Logo
field.description: Set this to an image that can be put as a watermark logo in the top right corner of the display. Transparent PNG files give the best results

field.name: jw_backcolor
field.label: JW Backcolor
field.description: Backgroundcolor of the controls, in HEX format

field.name: jw_frontcolor
field.label: JW Frontcolor
field.description: Texts and buttons color of the controls, in HEX format

field.name: jw_lightcolor
field.label: JW Lightcolor
field.description: Rollover color of the controls, in HEX format

field.name: jw_screencolor
field.label: JW Screencolor
field.description: Color of the display area, in HEX format. With the rotator, change this to your HTML page's color make images of different sizes blend nicely.

field.name: jw_quality
field.label: JW Quality
field.description: enables high-quality playback. This sets the smoothing of videos on/off, the deblocking of videos on/off and the dimensions of the camera small/large. Is saved as cookie.
